name: Fired Rice
description: Fried rice is a popular dish in many cuisines around the world, known for its versatility and rich flavors. It typically consists of cooked rice that is stir-fried in a wok or a frying pan and mixed with various ingredients like vegetables, eggs, meat, seafood, or tofu. The dish is seasoned with soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and sometimes chili or other spices, giving it a savory and aromatic taste.
